The world is changed. I feel it in the water, I feel it in the earth, I smell it in the air. Something has happened, please take up arms for your homes.

But in the end, it’s only a passing thing, this shadow. Even darkness must pass. A new day will come. And when the sun shines, it will shine out the clearer. There’s some good in this world.  And it’s worth fighting for .
Thunderbird is the most evil creatrue in jiangnanyewai, belive me, you will never want to face f flock of them.

This city was once the jewel of our kingdom. A place of light and beauty and music. And so it shall be once more! Let the armies know this: Never again will the land of my people fall into enemy hands. This city  has been reclaimed!

Dark General is the boss of this area, his strenth and power is inapproachable!  You‘d better check your armor before you facing him.
The moster in this area is much more stronger than before.If you not reach level 15 or don't have a excellent armor, you'd better leave.
It's a good day， isn't it? I will tell you a secret, the boss in this area has two brothers, it's very dangerous to fight with them at the same time!

The teants are incredibly strong, but their movement are slow, and often miss when they attack.
Yama is the king of the hell. There is a rumor that he is as strong as dark lord pomelo. In you are looking for him, goto the left corner.
This is Jiangzhou, the biggest and the last scene of this game. The ultima boss--Lordofpomelo is at this scene. If you want to challege him, you can go to the moutain in the center of this area.
The dark lord pomelo is at the top of the mountain. He is almost unbeatable for a single man.You'd better come with your friend.God blees you.
Ower king ， empire Yama, is the charger of the hell.His power is next to the dark lord pomelo.Do you dare to disturb him?
This little villege used to be my home, but now it has been taken by Star faries. Can you help me to drive them away. Be carful, they my look like beautiful ladies, but their weapon are ruthless.

Dark lord pomelo use the form of Monkey King. He is so swift that most of your attack will miss, his speed is so fast that no one can escapt from him. Please be carful, brave warrior, you will need a team to defeat him.
